entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 9:59 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:59 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
